roleset.name: waver, use ambiguous language, ambiguous
roleset.note: EQUIVOCATE-V NOTES: Added by Kevin (from equivocate.01-v)
EQUIVOCAL-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to equivocate.01. Equivocate.01 is a member of VN class linger-53.1. Framed by Katie. (from equivocal.01-j)

roles.note: This is often used incorrectly to mean 'equal to'. If it is used in this sense, a new frame will need to be created. (from equivocal.01-j)

example.name: General Usage Pattern
example.text: He equivocated over the hate speech of Rev. Wright.
example.arg: over the hate speech of Rev. Wright

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: He equivocated for weeks before deciding to come home for Thanksgiving.
example.arg: before deciding to come home for Thanksgiving

example.name: Both args
example.text: Redick is equivocal about his fate.

example.name: tests can be arg 0
example.text: The FISH is equivocal so we feel oncotype dx would propbably be helpful in this situation.
